UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Spider Venom Peptide Lycosin-II Has Potent Antimicrobial Activity against Clinically Isolated Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Wang L, Yang H, Xiao H, Farooq A, Liu Z, Hu M, Shi X

Literature.Title: Anti-biofilm and anti-inflammatory effects of Lycosin-II isolated from spiders against multi-drug resistant bacteria.
Literature.Author: Oh JH, Park J, Park Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human foreskin fibroblasts (HFF):3% Cell death=2 µM,Human foreskin fibroblasts (HFF):5% Cell death=4 µM,Human foreskin fibroblasts (HFF):47% Cell death=16 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=16 µM
